name: Not Flappy Birdie
description:
Not Flappy Bird gives you a new way to play the famous Flappy Bird, where you control the pipes in order of the bird don't hit them.

This game was developed by Minus One Games in less than 72 hours in order to take part of GameJolt's Indies VS Gamers Jam.

Notice: To submit your score you must use your GameJolt's username and game token.
